title: A Wolf Fighting with a Ram and a Lion with a Scepter before a Group of Animals; A Hunter with Dogs Encountering a Shepherd with his Flock and Dogs as a Wolf Lays Nearby
description: A Wolf Fighting with a Ram and a Lion with a Scepter before a Group of Animals; A Hunter with Dogs Encountering a Shepherd with his Flock and Dogs as a Wolf Lays Nearby; Unknown; Trier (probably), Germany; third quarter of 15th century; Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper; Leaf: 28.7 x 20.6 cm (11 5/16 x 8 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 1, fol. 27v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
